languages.text: "Не беспокойтесь — я и ваши слуги удостоверились, что в сем даре нет ни следа ереси или опасности для вас лично. Это воистину знак любви и почитания Вашей Светлости". {n}Клеменциа умолкает на секунду, а затем улыбается и качает головой.{/n} "Я никогда не встречала правителя милосерднее и ближе к простым слугам Бога-Императора, чем вы, Лорд-капитан. Надеюсь, вы не отвергнете этот искренний дар от своего народа".

traits.locale_text: "Не беспокойтесь — я и ваши слуги удостоверились, что в сем даре нет ни следа ереси или опасности для вас лично. Это воистину знак любви и почитания Вашей Светлости". {n}Клеменциа умолкает на секунду, а затем улыбается и качает головой.{/n} "Я никогда не встречала правителя милосерднее и ближе к простым слугам Бога-Императора, чем вы, Лорд-капитан. Надеюсь, вы не отвергнете этот искренний дар от своего народа".

languages.text: "You need not worry — your servants and I have confirmed that it bears no heresy or danger. It is truly a token of adoration and respect for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia pauses for a brief moment, then shakes her head with a smile.{/n} "Never before have I seen a ruler who was more merciful to the God-Emperor's common servants, more in touch with them, than you, Lord Captain. I hope that you will not reject this sincere gift from your people."
languages.original_text: "Не беспокойтесь — я и ваши слуги удостоверились, что в сем даре нет ни следа ереси или опасности для вас лично. Это воистину знак любви и почитания Вашей Светлости". {n}Клеменциа умолкает на секунду, а затем улыбается и качает головой.{/n} "Я никогда не встречала правителя милосерднее и ближе к простым слугам Бога-Императора, чем вы, Лорд-капитан. Надеюсь, вы не отвергнете этот искренний дар от своего народа".

traits.locale_text: "Don't worry, I and your servants confirmed that this gift does not contain any traces of heresy or danger for you in particular. This is truly a sign of love and appraisal to your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia falls quiet for a second, then smiles, and bobs her head.{/n} "I have never seen a ruler that would be closer and more merciful to God-Emperor's common servants than you, Lord Captain. I hope you will not reject this sincere gift from your people."

"Don't worry, I and your servants confirmed that this gift does not contain any traces of heresy or danger for you in particular. This is truly a sign of love and appraisal to your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia falls quiet for a second, then smiles, and bobs her head.{/n} "I have never seen a ruler that would be closer and more merciful to God-Emperor's common servants than you, Lord Captain. I hope you will not reject this sincere gift from your people."

"Don't worry, your servants and I have confirmed that it does not contain any traces of heresy or danger. It is truly a token of love and respect for your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia falls quiet for a second, then smiles, and nods.{/n} "I have never seen a ruler be closer and more merciful to the God-Emperor's common servants than you, Lord Captain. I hope you will not reject this sincere gift from your people."

"Don't worry, your servants and I have confirmed that it does not contain any traces of heresy or danger. It is truly a token of love and respect for your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia falls quiet for a second, then smiles, and nods.{/n} "I have never seen a ruler be closer and more merciful to the God-Emperor's common servants than you, Lord Captain. I hope you will not reject this sincere gift from your people."

"You need not worry — your servants and I have confirmed that it bears no heresy or danger. It is truly a token of adoration and respect for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia pauses for a brief moment, then shakes her head with a smile.{/n} "Never before have I seen a ruler who was more merciful to the God-Emperor's common servants, more in touch with them, than you, Lord Captain. I hope that you will not reject this sincere gift from your people."

languages.text: “您无需担心，我和您的仆从已经确认，这件礼物没有任何异端或危险的痕迹。这确确实实象征着人民对您的崇拜与敬意。”{n}克莱门缇雅沉默半晌，随后微笑起来，摇了摇头。{/n}“您如此亲近神皇普通的仆人，如此仁慈地对待臣民，我从未见过像您这样的统治者，舰长大人。希望您不会拒绝您的子民送您的这份诚挚礼物。”
languages.original_text: "You need not worry — your servants and I have confirmed that it bears no heresy or danger. It is truly a token of adoration and respect for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia pauses for a brief moment, then shakes her head with a smile.{/n} "Never before have I seen a ruler who was more merciful to the God-Emperor's common servants, more in touch with them, than you, Lord Captain. I hope that you will not reject this sincere gift from your people."

traits.locale_text: “您无需担心，我和您的仆从已经确认，这件礼物没有任何异端或危险的痕迹。这确确实实象征着人民对您的崇拜与敬意。”{n}克莱门缇雅沉默半晌，随后微笑起来，摇了摇头。{/n}“您如此亲近神皇普通的仆人，如此仁慈地对待臣民，我从未见过像您这样的统治者，舰长大人。希望您不会拒绝您的子民送您的这份诚挚礼物。”

languages.text: « Inutile de vous inquiéter, je me suis assurée, avec l'aide des serviteurs, qu'elle ne comporte aucun danger ni aucune trace d'hérésie. Il s'agit bel et bien d'un gage d'adoration et de respect à votre intention, Votre Seigneurie. » {n}Clémentia s'interrompt un bref instant avant de secouer la tête, un sourire aux lèvres.{/n} « Je n'avais encore jamais vu {mf|un dirigeant|une dirigeante} aussi {mf|clément|clémente} et proche des plus modestes serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'espère que vous accepterez cet humble présent de votre peuple. »
languages.original_text: "You need not worry — your servants and I have confirmed that it bears no heresy or danger. It is truly a token of adoration and respect for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia pauses for a brief moment, then shakes her head with a smile.{/n} "Never before have I seen a ruler who was more merciful to the God-Emperor's common servants, more in touch with them, than you, Lord Captain. I hope that you will not reject this sincere gift from your people."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de vous inquiéter, je me suis assurée, avec l'aide des serviteurs, qu'elle ne comporte aucun danger ni aucune trace d'hérésie. Il s'agit bel et bien d'un gage d'adoration et de respect à votre intention, Votre Seigneurie. » {n}Clémentia s'interrompt un bref instant avant de secouer la tête, un sourire aux lèvres.{/n} « Je n'avais encore jamais vu {mf|un dirigeant|une dirigeante} aussi {mf|clément|clémente} et proche des plus modestes serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'espère que vous accepterez cet humble présent de votre peuple. »

languages.text: 「ご心配なさらず、陛下の従者たちと私が異端に当たる物や危険物は入っていないことを確認しております。陛下への崇敬と敬愛のしるしです」{n}クレメンティアはしばらく視線を落とし、それから微笑み、会釈した。{/n}「私は、陛下ほど神帝陛下の一般の下僕たちに寄り添い、慈悲深く接する統治者を見たことがありません、ロード・キャプテン。どうか陛下がこの民からの心よりの贈り物をお受け取りになられるよう願っています」
languages.original_text: "You need not worry — your servants and I have confirmed that it bears no heresy or danger. It is truly a token of adoration and respect for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia pauses for a brief moment, then shakes her head with a smile.{/n} "Never before have I seen a ruler who was more merciful to the God-Emperor's common servants, more in touch with them, than you, Lord Captain. I hope that you will not reject this sincere gift from your people."

traits.locale_text: 「ご心配なさらず、陛下の従者たちと私が異端に当たる物や危険物は入っていないことを確認しております。陛下への崇敬と敬愛のしるしです」{n}クレメンティアはしばらく視線を落とし、それから微笑み、会釈した。{/n}「私は、陛下ほど神帝陛下の一般の下僕たちに寄り添い、慈悲深く接する統治者を見たことがありません、ロード・キャプテン。どうか陛下がこの民からの心よりの贈り物をお受け取りになられるよう願っています」

languages.text: «No tiene de qué preocuparse: los sirvientes y yo ya hemos comprobado que no hay herejía ni peligro alguno. De verdad se trata de una muestra de adoración y respeto por mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Clementia hace una breve pausa, menea la cabeza y sonríe.{/n} «Nunca he visto a un{mf||a} gobernante tan compasiv{mf|o|a} con los sirvientes comunes del Emperador ni a nadie que los entienda como usted, Lord Capitán. Espero que no rechace un regalo sincero de su pueblo».
languages.original_text: "You need not worry — your servants and I have confirmed that it bears no heresy or danger. It is truly a token of adoration and respect for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia pauses for a brief moment, then shakes her head with a smile.{/n} "Never before have I seen a ruler who was more merciful to the God-Emperor's common servants, more in touch with them, than you, Lord Captain. I hope that you will not reject this sincere gift from your people."

traits.locale_text: «No tiene de qué preocuparse: los sirvientes y yo ya hemos comprobado que no hay herejía ni peligro alguno. De verdad se trata de una muestra de adoración y respeto por mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Clementia hace una breve pausa, menea la cabeza y sonríe.{/n} «Nunca he visto a un{mf||a} gobernante tan compasiv{mf|o|a} con los sirvientes comunes del Emperador ni a nadie que los entienda como usted, Lord Capitán. Espero que no rechace un regalo sincero de su pueblo».

languages.text: "Keine Sorge, Eure Diener und ich haben bestätigt, dass das Geschenk keinerlei Spuren von Ketzerei oder Gefahr enthält. Es ist wirklich nur ein Zeichen der Bewunderung und des Respekts für Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Clementia hält kurz inne und schüttelt dann lächelnd den Kopf.{/n} "Ich habe noch nie zuvor einen Herrscher gesehen, der den gewöhnlichen Dienern des Gottimperators gegenüber gnädiger war, sie besser verstanden hat als Ihr, Lord Captain. Ich hoffe, Ihr werdet dieses aufrichtige Geschenk Eures Volkes nicht ablehnen."
languages.original_text: "You need not worry — your servants and I have confirmed that it bears no heresy or danger. It is truly a token of adoration and respect for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia pauses for a brief moment, then shakes her head with a smile.{/n} "Never before have I seen a ruler who was more merciful to the God-Emperor's common servants, more in touch with them, than you, Lord Captain. I hope that you will not reject this sincere gift from your people."

traits.locale_text: "Keine Sorge, Eure Diener und ich haben bestätigt, dass das Geschenk keinerlei Spuren von Ketzerei oder Gefahr enthält. Es ist wirklich nur ein Zeichen der Bewunderung und des Respekts für Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Clementia hält kurz inne und schüttelt dann lächelnd den Kopf.{/n} "Ich habe noch nie zuvor einen Herrscher gesehen, der den gewöhnlichen Dienern des Gottimperators gegenüber gnädiger war, sie besser verstanden hat als Ihr, Lord Captain. Ich hoffe, Ihr werdet dieses aufrichtige Geschenk Eures Volkes nicht ablehnen."

languages.text: "Endişelenmeyin. Hizmetkârlarınız ve ben, adağın kâfirlik veya tehlike içermediğini teyit ettik. Gerçekten de {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne duydukları hayranlık ve saygının göstergesi olarak sunuyorlar." {n}Clementia, bir anlığına duraksayıp ardından yüzünde bir gülümsemeyle baş sallıyor.{/n} "Daha önce Tanrı İmparator'un sıradan hizmetkârlarına bu kadar merhamet gösteren, onlarla bu kadar içli dışlı olan başka bir hükümdar görmemiştim Lord Kaptan. Umarım halkınızın bu naçizane hediyesini kabul buyurursunuz."
languages.original_text: "You need not worry — your servants and I have confirmed that it bears no heresy or danger. It is truly a token of adoration and respect for Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia pauses for a brief moment, then shakes her head with a smile.{/n} "Never before have I seen a ruler who was more merciful to the God-Emperor's common servants, more in touch with them, than you, Lord Captain. I hope that you will not reject this sincere gift from your people."
